property.name: mac-address
property.description: MAC address in traditional hex-digits-and-colons notation, or semicolon separated list of 6 decimal bytes (obsolete)

property.name: mac-address
property.description: MAC address in traditional hex-digits-and-colons notation, or or semicolon separated list of 20 decimal bytes (obsolete)

property.name: dns
property.description: List of DNS servers.

property.name: addresses
property.description: List of static IP addresses.

property.name: gateway
property.description: Gateway IP addresses as a string.

property.name: routes
property.description: List of IP routes.

property.name: dns
property.description: List of DNS servers.

property.name: addresses
property.description: List of static IP addresses.

property.name: gateway
property.description: Gateway IP addresses as a string.

property.name: routes
property.description: List of IP routes.

property.name: parity
property.description: The connection parity; even, odd, or none. Note that older versions of NetworkManager stored this as an integer: 69 ('E') for even, 111 ('o') for odd, or 110 ('n') for none.

property.name: data
property.variable: separate variables named after keys of the dictionary
property.description: The keys of the data dictionary are used as variable names directly under [vpn] section.

property.name: secrets
property.variable: separate variables named after keys of the dictionary
property.description: The keys of the secrets dictionary are used as variable names directly under [vpn-secrets] section.

property.name: mac-address
property.description: MAC address in traditional hex-digits-and-colons notation (e.g. 00:22:68:12:79:A2), or semicolon separated list of 6 bytes (obsolete) (e.g. 0;34;104;18;121;162)

property.name: cloned-mac-address
property.description: Cloned MAC address in traditional hex-digits-and-colons notation (e.g. 00:22:68:12:79:B2), or semicolon separated list of 6 bytes (obsolete) (e.g. 0;34;104;18;121;178).

property.name: mac-address-blacklist
property.description: MAC address blacklist.

property.name: ssid
property.description: SSID of Wi-Fi network.

property.name: mac-address
property.description: MAC address in traditional hex-digits-and-colons notation (e.g. 00:22:68:12:79:A2), or semicolon separated list of 6 bytes (obsolete) (e.g. 0;34;104;18;121;162).

property.name: cloned-mac-address
property.description: Cloned MAC address in traditional hex-digits-and-colons notation (e.g. 00:22:68:12:79:B2), or semicolon separated list of 6 bytes (obsolete) (e.g. 0;34;104;18;121;178).

property.name: mac-address-blacklist
property.description: MAC address blacklist.
